import React from 'react' const updateNote = (props) => { const {note} = props console.log(props); const [enote, setEnote] = useState({ eId: '', etitle: '', edescription: '', etag: '' }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { console.log(note._id) // e.preventDefault(); console.log(note.title) note.title = enote.etitle; note.description = enote.edescription; note.tag = enote.etag; console.log(enote.etitle) editNote(note._id, enote.etitle, enote.edescription, enote.etag); } const handleChange = (e) => { console.log(e); setEnote({ ...enote, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
Edit Note
) } export default updateNote
